About the Company: Veto Switchgears and Cables Limited, formerly Veto Switchgears and Cables Private Limited, is engaged in the manufacture and sale of wires and cables and electrical accessories in India. The Companys product portfolio ranges from industrial cables, stand cables to telephone & co-axial wires, from general switches to modular switches, from ceiling fans to rechargeable fans, compact fluorescent lamps and other electrical accessories. The Company supplies its products under the brands VETO and VIMAL POWER through its network of dealers to its customers in India, as well as select customers abroad. The Companys products are manufactured at its manufacturing unit located in Hardwar, Uttarakhand. The Company manufactures various products, such as electrical accessories under VETO brand and wires and cables under VETO POWER and VIMAL POWER brand.
